text: 11:24-25 Josua 1:3-5Egh nguazir ia arua zuir manaba, ia bar moghɨra da iniam. Eghtɨ ian nguazir mɨtaghniam, a Sautɨn amadaghan gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ikegh mangɨ notɨn amadaghan Lebanonɨn Mɨghsɨamɨn tugham. Egh mangɨ aruem anadi naghɨn Yufretisɨn Fanemɨn ikegh mangɨ, Mediterenianɨn Ongarir Ekiamɨn aruem ghuaghiri naghɨn tugham.
